q: "Hopefully, I'll be with the Eagles next year. We'll see what happens," said Michael Vick , who added that he expects "everything to go according to plan." We'll see what happens over the next couple months. I just got to be patient and take it day by day, he said. Hydraulic hybrid vehicle technology is one more promising path worth pursuing in the effort to reduce our carbon footprint, Sergio Marchionne said. "It has shown substantial increases in fuel economy when compared with traditional powertrains in the same type of vehicles.
